name: Cabbage
short_d: Muhanga cabbage seed. Cabbage is a leafy green vegetable known for its dense, compact head and subtle flavor. Grown in temperate climates around the world, it plays a vital role in countless traditional dishes, offering both nutrition and texture. Typically green or purple in color, cabbage is appreciated for its versatility and its ability to be eaten raw, fermented, or cooked in a variety of ways.
